page.title: 02Our Area.
page.content: Our area is on the outskirts of the small town of{Marple.}Half the area is rural with a great deal of parkland. The other half is residential containing affluent bungalows and architect-designed houses. It is crossed be a railway which runs into Manchester,by the Peak Forest Canal, and by the River Goyt. There are many roads and avenues as well as scenic places to walk where once the main land use was farming. The local sanatorium is now for sale as the once dirty air of Manchester has been cleaned up so much that there are no longer the many respiratory diseases it was built to deal with. Many of the residents are socially mobile and house prices have tripled in the last ten years.
